text: Vladimir Vladimirovich Petrov (; 30 June 1947 - 28 February 2017) was a Russian Soviet ice hockey player. He was an Olympic gold medalist twice (1972, 1976) and silver medalist (1980). He was born in Krasnogorsk. Petrov died on 28 February 2017 in Moscow, at the age of 69. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Russian ice hockey centres Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Sportspeople from Moscow Category:Competitors at the 1976 Winter Olympics
